attributes.additional_details:
Brian Blessed should be regarded as a national treasure. He is the oldest man to attempt Everest without oxygen, the oldest man to reach the magnetic North Pole on foot. He is a keen lover of animals and is said to care for thousnds at his home - as well as being a talented singer,

The man is a national treasure and should be regarded as such. The jack of all trades, master of many men don't come around very often and we should reward the Englishmen who fit the bill.

Please sign to award Brian Blessed the knighthood he so richly deserves; Why should they only go to bankers, civil servants and company directors? .
